attributes.action: We don't want armed troops on our streets!
attributes.additional_details: This is one step closer to martial law. They use the excuse of ISIS to do this however once introduced you will soon see Armed troops at protests and will only end badly.
attributes.background: On Monday 30th of November David Cameron is expected to announce the introduction of 10,000 armed troops to flood Britain’s streets as part of the new five-year national security strategy which abolishes the divide between the Army and Police
